fileModifier

Class FileModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • fileModifier.FileModifier

  • public class FileModifier
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs the command given by the user, stores the created task objects, and writes the data into the data file.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Urvashi

      • editEndDate

        public void editEndDate(int lineToBeEdit,
                        java.lang.String endDate)
        This method edits the end date variable, by checking whether it is a date object with time or date without time then changes the date appropriately
        Parameters:

      • editTimeline

        public void editTimeline(int lineToBeEdit,
                         java.lang.String startDate,
                         java.lang.String endDate)
        This method edits the entire timeline of the task, which must include both the start date as well as the end date
        Parameters:
        lineToBeEdit - the line index of the task to be edited
        startDate - the start date object with or without time
        endDate - the end date object with or without time
